alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:07PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Emery County through 645 PM MDT... At 606 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Green River, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Green River. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 141 and 159. US Route 6 between mile markers 283 and 300. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding, especially in area slot canyons and drainages. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
